title: Family-Friendly Westin Anaheim Stay with 3-Day, 1-Park Per Day Disneyland Resort Tickets & Daily Breakfast
description:
Create magical memories with a stylish Westin escape, ideally located directly opposite the iconic _Disneyland_ Resort. Set off on the adventure of a lifetime with the entire family and see nostalgic characters and childhood stories come alive before your eyes at two of the state’s top attractions: _Disneyland_ Park and _Disney California Adventure_ Park.

Between riding thrilling rollercoasters and exploring the vibrant _Downtown Disney_ District stores and eateries, bask in the panoramic views of the park with a drink in hand at the resort’s own RISE Rooftop Lounge, where you'll have a prime spot to take in the seasonal firework display.

This expansive resort is a step above the rest. Spend slow mornings fuelling up with delicious breakfast at the likes of Tangerine Room, afternoons relaxing in the shimmering pool, and evenings enjoying diverse dining at one of the hotel’s seven restaurants or bars.
offer_address: 1030 West Katella Avenue, Anaheim, California 92802, United States

title: Stylish California Hyatt Escape with 3-Day 1-Park Per Day Disneyland Resort Tickets
description:
Adventure and magic await at the spectacular Hyatt Regency Orange County, located just a 10-minute drive from _Disneyland_ Resort. The luxurious hotel makes the most out of its fabulous location, offering roundtrip shuttle transportation straight to the theme park to make sure your stay is as effortless as possible (charges apply). Watch your favourite childhood stories come to life at two of the top attractions in California - _Disneyland_ Park and _Disney California Adventure_ Park. Not to be overshadowed by the theme parks, the _Downtown Disney_ District offers world-class dining options, plenty of shopping and even more entertainment - just in case you haven’t had your fill of fun.

Before heading off on your enchanting _Disneyland_ experience, savour some quick gourmet bites from the hotel’s Citrus Grove Deli or get your caffeine fix from the onsite Starbucks Coffee, found in the lobby. At the end of each day, unwind in one of the two refreshing outdoor pools, roast some s’mores on the open-air communal firepit or take advantage of the complimentary game equipment on the sports recreation deck.
offer_address: 11999 Harbor Boulevard, Garden Grove, California 92840, United States

vendor_name: Howard Johnson Anaheim Hotel & Water Playground
title: Family-Friendly California Escape with 3-Day Disneyland Resort Park Hopper Tickets
description:
Whisk the whole family away on an adventure full of wonder on the doorstep of _Disneyland_ Resort. Relive all your childhood favourites at two of the top attractions in California - _Disneyland_ Park and _Disney California Adventure_ Park, just an eight-minute walk away. Beyond the amusement park excitement, the fun continues along the _Downtown Disney_ District with world-class dining, shopping and buzzing entertainment as far as the eye can see. Perfect for young families seeking spacious rooms and modern comforts, Howard Johnson Anaheim Hotel & Water Playground (a six-time winner of TripAdvisor’s Top 25 Hotels for Families in the United States) is the ideal location for relaxing after busy days spent exploring, providing comfort, convenience and family-style fun in abundance.

When you’re not tripping around the popular parks, the resort boasts a sparkling garden pool and thrilling Castaway Cove water park to keep you cool and entertained. Fuel up or wind down at the end of the day with a delicious meal at Mimi's Cafe Restaurant.
location_description: Howard Johnson Anaheim Hotel & Water Playground
offer_address: 1380 South Harbor Blvd, Anaheim, California 92802, United States

title: California Disneyland Park Three-Day Park Passes
description: The happiest place on Earth is calling: discover pure joy, childhood nostalgia and classic rollercoasters with your choice between a three-day/one-park per day pass or the three-day Park Hopper® pass which allows you to go between Anaheim's Disneyland Park and Disney California Adventure Park. Watch Disneyland’s Main Street comes alive in a sensorial explosion of music, extravagant floats, colourful lights and favourite Disney characters during the legendary Main Street Parade, delight little ones with unforgettable encounters with their favourite characters, and cross over to the adventure park for even more thrilling rides and theatrical wonders, such as the Marvel Comic Universe's Avengers Campus, Pixar Pier, the Radiator Springs Racers and the Soarin Around the World ride.
offer_address: 1313 Disneyland Drive, Anaheim, California 92802, United States

title: Disneyland Resort Sheraton Anaheim Escape with 3-Day Park Hopper Tickets & US$50 Hotel Dining Credit
description:
Get in quick and whisk yourself away on the adventure of a lifetime with a stylish Sheraton escape located just a stone's throw from two of the top attractions in California - _Disneyland_ Park and _Disney California Adventure_ Park. Create magical memories at the enchanting _Sleeping Beauty Castle_, on thrilling rides and with beloved characters.

Beyond the amusement park excitement, the fun continues along the _Downtown Disney_ District with world-class dining, shopping and buzzing entertainment as far as the eye can see. Thoughtfully designed and exceptionally located, this elegant stay is just moments from _Disneyland_ Park, Anaheim Convention Centre and Angel Stadium.

At the end of each thrilling day, unwind in the shimmering outdoor pool, make the most of the high-end fitness equipment in the gymnasium and enjoy a relaxed meal at The World Market before retreating to your tastefully appointed room with views of the nightly fireworks display.
location_description: Sheraton Park Hotel at the Anaheim Resort
offer_address: 1855 South Harbor Boulevard, Anaheim, California 92802, United States

title: Five-Star JW Marriott Retreat w. the Highest Rooftop Bar in Anaheim
description: Relax and enjoy a fun-filled Southern California escape at the five-star JW Marriott, Anaheim Resort. Just moments from the magical Disneyland Park, Anaheim GardenWalk and Angel Stadium, this family-friendly resort is the ideal launchpad to discover the Orange County region. Plunge into the glittering pool and taste signature dishes at Tocca Ferro Italian Chophouse, before ascending to Parkestry Rooftop Bar - the highest in Anaheim to drink in views of spectacular sunsets, fireworks and city vistas.
offer_address: 1775 S Clementine St, Anaheim, CA 92802, United States

title: Anaheim Contemporary Suite Escape with Daily Breakfast & Disneyland Resort Tickets
description:
Nestled in the heart of Anaheim, these self-contained suites are your home away from home with a touch of laid-back California cool. Take it easy and lounge by the sparkling outdoor pool or fill up on local Cali flavours before adventuring around the parks, with entries included in your package.

Just steps from the magic of _Disneyland_ Resort and within easy reach of Southern California's best attractions, Clementine Hotel & Suites Anaheim is your gateway to endless fun. Tuck into Anaheim's thriving dining scene - indulge in pan-seared diver scallops at Poppy & Seed or the elegant atmosphere and delectable Italian steakhouse cuisine at Anaheim White House.

You're a short drive from the dazzling beaches of Orange County, the shopping paradise of _Downtown Disney_ District, and the excitement of Adventure City, a family-friendly theme park that's perfect for younger children with kid-sized rides and the promise of pure joy and endless entertainment.
offer_address: 1700 South Clementine Street, Anaheim, California 92802 United States

vendor_name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Anaheim South
title: California Hilton Escape with 3-Day Disneyland Resort Park Hopper Tickets & Daily Breakfast
description:
Unforgettable adventures await at Embassy Suites by Hilton Anaheim South, located just a 10-minute drive away from _Disneyland_ Resort. The ideal retreat to experience the magical world of Disney, this luxurious hotel promises a relaxing respite where you can kick up your feet after days of exploration. Watch your favourite childhood stories come to life at two of the top attractions in California - _Disneyland_ Park and _Disney California Adventure_ Park. Not to be overshadowed by the theme parks, the _Downtown Disney_ District offers world-class dining options, plenty of shopping and even more entertainment - just in case you haven’t had your fill of fun.

Before heading off on your enchanting _Disneyland_ experience, stop by the hotel's atrium to savour a hearty buffet breakfast. At the end of each thrilling day, unwind in the crystal-clear outdoor pool, make the most of the high-end fitness equipment in the gymnasium, and enjoy a relaxed meal at the onsite Serengeti Grill, where you can take in views of the hotel's four-metre indoor waterfall alongside laidback, kid- and parent-approved meals, before retreating to your comfortable room for a well-deserved rest.
location_description: Embassy Suites by Hilton Anaheim South
offer_address: 11767 Harbor Boulevard, Garden Grove 92840, California, United States

title: Bright Anaheim Escape Moments from Disneyland Resort & Anaheim Convention Center
description: Magic awaits with an adventure to Southern California and a stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim, an IHG Hotel. Occupying prime position in the heart of vibrant Anaheim, you'll be just steps away from Disneyland Resort and a five-minute drive from Anaheim Convention Center. Explore the eclectic mix of eateries in the Anaheim Packing District or catch a game at Angel Stadium. Back at the hotel, unwind in the pool or savour delicious local dishes at Chambers Bar & Bistro.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Anaheim, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 435 West Katella Avenue, Anaheim, California 92802, USA

title: Disneyland Resort Pixar Place Hotel with Early Theme Park Entry, Themed Dining & Rooftop Pool
description:
Experience the magic of Disney with a stay at _Pixar Place_ Hotel, just steps from the _Disneyland_ Theme Parks in Anaheim, California. This playful property, inspired by beloved Pixar films, houses themed rooms - each one a tribute to Pixar's beloved films - three joyful eateries and bars and a rooftop pool deck with a waterslide and splash pad.

Staying at _Pixar Place_ Hotel comes with exclusive perks, such as early theme park entry, fitness classes and movie nights for the whole family. When you're not immersed in the fun-filled theme parks, relax in a private poolside cabana or, for a change of pace, explore the nearby vibrant _Downtown Disney_ District, brimming with unique shops, live entertainment and diverse dining options
offer_address: 1717 Disneyland Drive, Anaheim CA 92802, United States

title: Family-Friendly Disneyland Resort Grand Californian Escape near Downtown Disney with Three Pools & Spa
description:
Step into the heart of the magic at _Disney’s Grand Californian Hotel & Spa_, an exclusive retreat located in _Disneyland_ Resort. With direct access to _Disney California Adventure_ and just moments from _Disneyland_ Resort and the vibrant _Downtown Disney_ District, this craftsman-style hotel immerses you in the wonder of Disney like never before.

Perfect for families, the hotel offers elegantly designed rooms, ensuring a restful haven after days of adventure. Beyond the parks, the fun continues with multiple themed pools, award-winning dining options and the serene Tenaya Stone Spa, where relaxation takes centre stage.
offer_address: 1600 Disneyland Drive, Anaheim, California 92802, United States

title: Contemporary California Stay near Disneyland Resort
description:
Soak up golden California sunshine and discover the magic of the nearby _Disneyland_ Resort and theme parks with a stay at Sonesta Anaheim Resort. Discover your home-away-from-home in bright, family-friendly rooms and suites in the heart of Orange County's buzzing Anaheim. Flop onto a sun-soaked lounger poolside and sip an ice-cold beer, or work up a sweat at the 24/7 onsite fitness centre. Don't miss a minute of the action at The Burger Place Lounge, which serves up a hearty dining menu in front of 16 large TVs showing the latest sporting games.

The resort is just minutes from Anaheim's signature attractions, _Disneyland_ Resort and _Disney California Adventure Park._ Both parks are within a 30-minute walk from the resort and are accessible by the local area shuttle bus. Other attractions including Knott's Berry Farm, Buena Park, The Outlets at Orange and Santa Ana Zoo are all within driving distance.
offer_address: 1915 S Manchester Ave, Anaheim, CA 92802, United States
